function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Demographic characteristics and population densities impacting the effectiveness of NPHIs in controlling COVID-19 spread.","Impact":"Inadequate consideration of these factors may lead to ineffective implementation of NPHIs.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough demographic analysis and population density assessments when planning NPHIs. Develop tailored strategies for different population characteristics.","Technologies":"Population modeling and data analytics tools for demographic analysis.","People":"Communities with diverse demographic characteristics, public health authorities, and policymakers.","Owner":"Public health authorities, research institutions, and data analysts."},{"Description":"Limited number of studies considering demographic and geographic factors in analyzing the effectiveness of NPHIs.","Impact":"Lack of comprehensive understanding of how demographic and geographic factors impact NPHI effectiveness.","Mitigation":"Encourage and support further research that integrates demographic and geographic factors in NPHI analysis. Collaborate with international research institutions to gather diverse data.","Technologies":"Data collection tools, international collaboration platforms for research.","People":"Research institutions, public health agencies, international health organizations.","Owner":"Research institutions, international health organizations."},{"Description":"Inadequate consideration of the role of health data infrastructures in evaluating NPHI effectiveness in pandemics.","Impact":"Lack of robust studies to assess NPHI effectiveness due to data infrastructure limitations.","Mitigation":"Invest in strengthening health data infrastructures globally. Foster collaboration between countries to improve data sharing and analysis capabilities.","Technologies":"Health data management systems, data sharing platforms, data analysis tools.","People":"Health data professionals, public health agencies, government health departments.","Owner":"Government health departments, international health organizations, data management companies."}]}
